## TextCanvas.pickText() method

Executes the `pickCallback` for all previously stored picking data for text covering the specified screen position.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pickText(position: THREE.Vector2, callback: (pickData: any | undefined) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  position | THREE.Vector2 |  |
|  callback | (pickData: any \| undefined) =&gt; void |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
